Package gameobject

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameobject.Question
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class stores the question, fun-fact, and answers to the question. These are passed to the QuizView and QuizModel to populate the quiz. Each animal in the game will have its own question.
    Author:
    Miguel Fuentes, W Mathieu Mimms-Boyce
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
